pl.tomek_krzyszko.bluemanager.scanner

Class BlueScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • pl.tomek_krzyszko.bluemanager.scanner.BlueScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class BlueScanner
extends android.app.Service
    Class responsible for scanning for nearby devices. Found devices are saved to internal collection. If the device is not scanned for certain amount of time it is removed from the collection. BlueScanner runs scanning and parsing tasks on its own threads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlueScanner.LocalBinder
      Binder class associated with BlueScanner instance.

      • connectToDevice

        public boolean connectToDevice(BlueDevice blueDevice,
                               BlueDeviceConnectionListener blueDeviceConnectionListener)
        Method responsible for starting connection process with scanned BlueDevice This code pass the connection process to BlueDeviceController instance and return proper information in callback methods
        Parameters:
        blueDevice - BlueDevice to which we want to connect
        blueDeviceConnectionListener - BlueDeviceConnectionListener as a callback method for monitoring connection process
        Returns:
        true if process start properly, false when there is a problem with BlueDevice

      • disconnectAll

        public boolean disconnectAll()
        Method responsible for disconnect with all connected BlueDevice

      • disconnectFromDevice

        public boolean disconnectFromDevice(BlueDevice blueDevice)
        Method responsible for stop connection process with connected BlueDevice This code disconnect from the device
        Parameters:
        blueDevice - BlueDevice with which we want to disconnect
        Returns:
        true if process start properly, false when there is a problem with BlueDevice

      • performAction

        public boolean performAction(BlueDevice blueDevice,
                             BlueAction blueAction,
                             BlueDeviceActionListener blueDeviceActionListener)
        Method which perform action on the device This is only wrapper to use method from BlueDeviceController class
        Parameters:
        blueDevice - on which action should be done
        blueAction - which we want to use
        blueDeviceActionListener - as callback method to get information about performed action
        Returns:
        true if method successfully starts proper bluetooth process, false if device or action are wrong

      • startScan

        public void startScan(java.lang.String address,
                      java.lang.Long time,
                      java.util.UUID[] serviceUUIDs,
                      android.bluetooth.le.ScanSettings scanSettings,
                      java.util.List<android.bluetooth.le.ScanFilter> scanFilters,
                      boolean lowEnergy)
        Method repsonsible for starting scanninc process
        Parameters:
        address - MAC of the device we want to find
        time - for how long we want to scan
        serviceUUIDs - of the device which we want to find
        scanSettings - proper scan settings for scanning process
        scanFilters - extra scan filters
        lowEnergy - information about type of the device we want to find

      • stopScan

        public void stopScan(boolean lowEnergy)
        Method used to stop scanning process
        Parameters:
        lowEnergy - information about scanning type
